div.p: This project is a concrete implementation of Mevenide Core for Eclipse. See the features list and the Help page to learn more about Mevenide for Eclipse. Latest release and zipped sources can be downloaded here. However the preferred way to install Mevenide for Eclipse is through the Eclipse Update Manager ; please refer to this document for instructions on using it.

Mevenide for Eclipse wont work with Eclipse version 2.x since some APIs and utility classes of the 3.0-stream are used. Current Mevenide release has been tested under WinXP Eclipse 3.0 M3 With JDK 1.4.1 and Maven 1.0-rc1. Please note that JDK 1.4+ is required since Java 1.4 regex Engine is used.
